amendatorysection.para: The department shall issue electronically a report to the Legislature on or before January 31 of each year which discloses the number of professional, occupational, or recreational licenses which were suspended and the number which were erroneously suspended and restored as a result of the License Suspension Act for the prior year. The Director of Motor Vehicles shall issue electronically a report to the Legislature on or before January 31 of each year which discloses the number of operators' licenses which were suspended and the number which were erroneously suspended and restored as a result of the License Suspension Act for the prior year.
